resources.string: Change max number of displayed apps
More apps in the list means more distraction, so we prefer to set this value to less than 3. In that way, our brain will stay focused on the app that we actually wanted to open.

We do not track nor save any private data. PERIOD. 

This app is a minimalistic search tool that enables you to find and access all of your apps. You can now clear your phone's home screen and use this app whenever you need to access another app. As a result, your home screen will be clean and minimalistic. 

Note: Apps you want to access using this app must be already installed on your device. 

How does this work? 
• This app requests list of your apps from your device and displays it on the screen, nothing is being tracked or saved. 
• If our app crashes, Google Play Store may show us an anonymous Error log. 
• Apps you search for are never going to leave this app and won't be saved anywhere.
